item.title: Docs: Upgrade Multicluster Verrazzano
item.description:
Each cluster of a multicluster environment is upgraded separately. Start with the admin cluster, and then for each managed cluster, follow the Upgrade Verrazzano instructions.

Verify the upgrade of each managed cluster

For each managed cluster, follow the instructions in each of the following sections:

  • Verify that managed cluster registration completed
  • Verify that managed cluster metrics are being collected
  • Verify that managed cluster logs are being collected
